paragraphs: Today, we're wrapping up our video series focusing on each of Diablo IV's announced classes. We've already covered the barbarian and sorceress, and now we're turning our attention to the druid. This returning favorite has a lot of new things to offer, most notably his ability to instantly transform from human to werewolf to werebear. It's good. Don't believe me? Watch this video!

Three of us played the demo at Blizzard's offices during our Diablo IV cover-story visit, and we did something a little different for this one. Rather than tackle each of the game's three announced characters, we all chose the druid. Expect lots of transformations, boulder rolling, and storm summoning.
Enjoy the video, and we'll be back this Wednesday with world boss gameplay from Diablo IV. Otherwise, click the banner below to check out other content within our Blizzard Issue:
authors: Jeff Has Spent Countless Hours Using His Thumbs To Maneuver Images On Television Screens.
